meanings.definition: A device that uses gyroscopes to stabilize an object or system.
meanings.sent1: The gyrostabilizers on the drone kept it steady in the strong wind.
meanings.sent2: The ship's gyrostabilizers prevented it from rocking too much in the rough sea.
meanings.sent3: The gyrostabilizers on the robot made it look like it was dancing!
meanings.sent4: Her calm demeanor acted as gyrostabilizers, keeping the team focused during the crisis.
meanings.sent5: The gyrostabilizers hummed softly, their magic keeping everything perfectly balanced.

meanings.definition: The act of stabilizing using gyroscopes.
meanings.sent1: The gyrostabilizers of the aircraft ensured a smooth flight.
meanings.sent2: His invention of gyrostabilizers revolutionized the field of engineering.
meanings.sent3: The gyrostabilizers at the amusement park made the roller coaster ride even more thrilling!
meanings.sent4: In her hands, the gyrostabilizers became a symbol of control and precision.
meanings.sent5: The gyrostabilizers worked tirelessly, maintaining equilibrium in the chaotic environment.
